component.name: KBackup
component.summary: KBackup is an application that lets you back up any folders or files in a tar archive to a local folder, e.g. a locally mounted device like a ZIP drive, USB stick, etc. or a remote URL

description.p: KBackup is an application which lets you back up your data in a simple, user friendly way

ul.li: Using profile files with definitions for Folders and files to be included or excluded from the backup
The backup target can be either a locally mounted device like a ZIP drive, USB stick, etc. or any remote URL
Running automated backups without using a graphical user interface
